data.title: Love this brand
data.body: These are comfy and fit great! Easy match with any outfit! I am a women‚Äôs 9.5 shoe size and I ordered a size 9 in these and they fit perfect! Recommend if you are in between sizes to size down. They don‚Äôt slip on my heels and I always wear no show socks with this type of shoe. Got at a great price as part of a deal.

data.title: Comfortable and Light-Weight
data.body: I am a big fan of HeyDudes so I knew I wanted to wear them on my big day. They are true to size so if you are like me and want to customize them for your wedding day I would size up because after customizing them they were a little tighter to get on.

data.title: Washable, Comfortable and love the color!!
data.body: Second pair that I bought. Easy to slip on. The price is great also. My husband loves his 2 pairs also. You can‚Äôt go wrong for casual wear.

data.title: Hey Dude, why did I wait so long?
data.body: I have wanted to try Hey Dudes for so long! The only thing I regret about getting these, is that I didn‚Äôt get them sooner!! Wow the comfort is unmatched. They are so lightweight and comfortable, if you could walk on a cloud, the cloud would be called Hey Dude! I was worried about the sizing since all shoes fit differently. Based on other reviews that said these run big, I sized down and I‚Äôm so glad I did! I would suggest following the directions and measuring your feet with a tape measure. My feet are just under 9‚Äù and the 6 is perfect. I normally wear a 6 1/2 or 7 depending on the shoe. I should mention that my left foot is a half size bigger than my right. So I always have to get a half size bigger otherwise my left foot will be crammed. This is not the case here. While my right foot definitely has more room, my left foot doesn‚Äôt feel cramped at all. So if you are in between sizes, definitely size down. I got the sunset pink color and they are so pretty! I love the turquoise inner lining! If you have to sell a kidney, get them. If you have to sell a child, get them. If you have to take out a loan, get them. Just do it. You won‚Äôt be sorry! Definitely recommend this brand and style!

data.title: I hate shoes but I love these.
data.body: I really love these. The first day or two of wearing these, my feet were kinda sore but immediately after, they are the most comfortable things and so lightweight and easy to put on especially on the go. They‚Äôre cute to dress up or down in and honestly I feel cooler wearing them. üòé if you can buy them on sale, do it. If you can buy them at regular pricing. Do it. (I got mine from Black Friday prices and got them THE NEXT DAY!) if you can buy them while wrestling a hog and eating a breakfast burrito at the same time, do it. If you can sound like Batman himself, do it. Even if you can‚Äôt do anything at all, do this. All jokes aside, these are perfect.

data.title: Color of shoe lace ends were not sage green, but beige.
data.body: The shoes are excellent quality, comfortable, and I love them. I am not able to wear them because I ordered a size up and they are too big. And I picked the color due to it matching the outfit for a celebration if life outfit. The end of shoe laces were supposed to be sage green. They are beige. I will reorder.

data.title: Favorite Shoes ever
data.body: These are my favorite shoes I have! I live in New Mexico and they are perfect for almost all occasions. I use them as more business casual, or just casual hanging out. They are so comfy and come in so many colors and styles you never can run out of ideas. They are super easy to clean with my shoe cleaner so it‚Äôs not hard to keep them looking nice!

data.title: Comfort
data.body: These are the best for comfort. On top of the comfort they go with everything I wear! True to size. 10 out of 10, I would recommend!

data.title: No break in required !
data.body: After breaking my foot twice with surgery once finding shoes that were actually comfortable, didn't slip off and don't look like Ortho shoes was non existent. These definitely give surfer vibe shoes but still look great on a 65 year old Grandma.

data.title: Comfortable!
data.body: I got these for my little sister for Christmas and she wears the almost everyday. They are super easy to slip on and go to school. They also super comfy!

data.title: Love Hey Dudes
data.body: These Hey Dudes are adorable for Spring and Summer. They came packages well and on time. I wear a 9 and they are true to size. I have 5 pair of Hey Dudes and each fit exactly the same. I love the fact the insole is removable so the shoe is machine washable. I'll definitely be buying a pair in navy.

data.body: I received a lot of compliments on these shoes. Great wear and good design.

data.title: Happy with them
data.body: Easy to get on and off. Fit true to size but if you have narrow feet you have to tighten up the toggles. Go on YouTube for a tutorial on how to do that.

data.title: Great casual shoes
data.body: I purchased these for my daughter to have a fast casual shoe that isn‚Äôt a clunky croc. She has really enjoyed them. The fit was as expected. She has received a lot of positive comments at school. The colors help to match a lot of different outfits.

data.title: Well constructed shoes but very wide
data.body: The shoes are very nice. They are well constructed. I notice as the day wears on when I wear these my feet hurt. The support does not last. It may also be that the shoes are very wide, and I have to work at keeping them on during the day. I would almost have to wear multiple thick socks just to keep them on. I would not purchase this brand again for myself. When I do wear them it is now in the morning to walk around the house before dressing. They are just not reliable as a wear all day shoe for me.

data.title: Nice shoes, but be careful with sizing
data.body: I got these for my wife on Christmas. She normally wears a women's size 7 (using Clarks and Toms as a reference), but these shoes (in a women's size 7) were just too big. They couldn't be tightened enough to fit properly, and since they're only like to stretch a bit with use, we returned them for one size smaller. Your experience might vary, but I would say it is NOT safe to assume your normal size will be correct. Otherwise, my wife loves these shoes and once we get the correct size I am sure she will enjoy them very much.

data.title: Hey dude shoes
data.body: I love Hey Dudes! They are so comfortable. I bought a size 9 and it fits great. In every other shoe I usually wear either a 9 or 9.5. These are comfy and worth the money. One tip with Hey Dudes is you can take out the sole of the shoe, put a no show sock around the sole, put it back in the shoe, and then just slip your bare feet in and out. You don't have to worry about wearing socks. Just change out the no show socks on the sole.

Toward the end of the day they were starting to bother my feet a little. I am used to more arch support and there isn‚Äôt really any. I think they‚Äôre great for running errands in.

data.title: lightweight and surprisingly comfortable
data.body:
Update: Its been about a month of consistent wear and I still like them very much. The insole isnt special but weirdly very comfortable even for standing for long hours. The lightweight nature of these is another huge bonus. I liked them so much I will def get a second pair soon. The only thing about them you need to be aware of is they are made of breathable fabric so the wind cuts right through. They are not made for winter or wet environments. Still 5 stars for me though.

Ive only had these a few days but they seem to be comfortable and they fit well after I readjusted the knots to kind of tighten the top. There is enough room for insoles if I want those too, so I am buying a second pair in another color.

data.title: Will wear every day
data.body: Recovering from a fractured foot. The light weight, casual but nice looking, comfortable features of these work perfectly for this Florida girl. Easy to swap and put my own insoles in the shoes. Not to mention how trendy they are!

data.title: Hey dudes
data.body: I love these hey dudes

data.title: Give these time to fit
data.body: I bought these earlier this year and am back for more. Heard about them from a cute TikTok of this guy only wanting HeyDude shoes and looked them up. Design? Eh. Reviews awesome so I tried them. I thought the white sole against the black canvas would look too "old" but it really doesn't once you put them on. It does take some time to become the most comfortable shoes you own. When I first wore these they hurt. I wear a 10.5 and went with a 10 based on some reviews saying they stretch. They do and they did and are now very, very comfortable. People stop me to ask where I bought them, which surprised me. I am back here to buy more and I do still wish they had a shoe that I think is more fashionable, but I'm still buying more. Several more. Enjoy these. They're great.

data.title: Hey Dude shoes
data.body: The shoes are designed to give your toes room, which if you have cramped toes, these are for you. They have many colors to choose from, and with the solid soles, they‚Äôre comfortable indoors and out.

data.title: Most comfortable shoes ever!!
data.body: I normally don‚Äôt like shoes that might rub the back of my heel, but these don‚Äôt at all! They are literally the most comfortable shoe I‚Äôve ever worn! They feel like wearing slippers. I now own Hey Dudes in 4 colors because I love them so much. If you put a small footie sock over the sole, you can keep them from smelling if you go siockless! Then just take the socks out and wash them and you don‚Äôt have to wear socks with them. Of course you can wear socks with them as well and it doesn‚Äôt effect the comfort! LOVE these shoes!
